Service Details: Services include:- Information and referral services- Community support groups- Social outreach events- Educational events- Seminars and lecture series- AutismBC is a parent based and directed society that has been working to provide information and support to individuals and families affected by autism- AutismBC is a founding member of the Provincial and Territorial Council of Autism Canada (formerly Autism Society Canada and Autism Canada Foundation), as well as a member of the Canadian Autism Spectrum Disorders Alliance (CASDA)- AutismBC is a non-profit, registered charity and acknowledge the financial support of the Province of British Columbia - In addition to the Richmond head office, there are branch offices in Northern BC, the Interior and on Vancouver Island
